ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
"The Hexbox: It's Alive," Part 2. Tarot, Raven, and the Skeleton Man are still trapped in the alternate Monster World created by the Cursed Hexbox Game System. The three must find a way back to their own dimension or forever live in this realm as a Vampire, Werewolf, and Bride of the Monster!
